channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Human Excrement in stairwell outside no 13 Dorset Court, 24th September
item.description:
Human excrement in stairwell outside no 13 Dorset Court. Very serious Health Hazard, Difficult to walk up or down stairs without treading in it, plus the smell etc

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hertford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 18 Kingsway - Petts Wood. Vile ugly tree affecting pavement access and danger to pasing cars, 24th September
item.description:
I have reported the verminous tree outside our house many times over the years to typically no council respose. Lower branches are now restricting view, parking and cause scratches to any cars passing close to kerb. I have to tell any visitors not to park outside as their car will be scratched. Similarly, lower branches now restrict pedestrians on pavement and children in pushchairs are likely to be scratched . The ghastly tree is an absolute ugly eyesore , it is now taller than my house, its higher branches hang over my garden depositing seeds and leaves which leave residue on my car and have to be removed from drains to prevent blockage. Its roots lift the pavement which has been repaired several times and are now starting to lift and crack my front wall. Im sure these comments will continue to fall on deaf ears but I will continue to report so as when legal actions commence I will have an audit trail of non action.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsway, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10 inch pothole Sydney Road, 24th September
item.description:
Smaller pothole developed in to much bigger pothole very close to previous pothole repair. Big stones are coming out of it and could be flicked up and damage surrounding cars or even the public. When raining, it fills up with water. In between 23 and 6 Sydney road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sydney Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Could tree at 75 Elmstead Ave be inspected?, 24th September
item.description:
This tree appears cracked and in poor condition. Could it be inspected and if unsafe now could it be removed and noted for replanting asap?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Avenue, Elmstead, London

item.title: Human excrement on public stairway, 24th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hertford Road, Hackney, London
